title: Bugs on the boards as of Late
body:
Im not sure what riot has been doing to the boards recently but when they removed the attach a file feature a couple of things changed

1: for whatever reason the toolbar is in the box with the text. If your text goes down too low it will overlap forcing the user to have to find a way to space the bottom of the text so it doesn't overlap.
http://i.imgur.com/YrxfEAg.png


2: for whatever reason when editing a discussion that you posted the box becomes REALLY small and you cant even scroll down, meaning you have to scroll drag by highlighting.
http://i.imgur.com/v6GgkU1.png

not only are these glaring issues that really hurt the experience of using these boards, they're new issues. that just RECENTLY appeared. plz fix, Riot.

On top of these i really wish that clicking EDIT wouldnt open the basic Html codes for each special character. why does the format change when trying to edit? it clutters the text.

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for the report. We will look into these, but can you first give us a little more information?

1. Which OS are you using?
2. Which browser are you using?
3. Are you in incognito mode?

That should be all for now.  Thanks!
I am in incognito mode, should I be expecting any problem?

I don't have the second issue, but I do this person's first issue where the bar when creating a discussion will be in the way after so much text.

1. Windows 7
2. Chrome
3. Nuuuuuupe.
hasnt happened for me. i smell PS
At the bottom right corner in the text box, there is a little triangle made of lines that if you click and drag out will make the box bigger. Solves the problem :)
Thanks, and it's a good solution, but this shouldnt be a problem in the first place.
